Package it.polimi.myShelfie.controller

Class GameController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.myShelfie.controller.GameController
public class GameController extends Object
The controller core. It manipulates the model consequently to the players actions, in order to make the game go on. Almost all the methods of this class are called by Lobby
